title: Roasted Sweet Potato Bowl with Carrot-Ginger Vinaigrette
directions: In each of four individual serving bowls, add 1 1/2 cups brown rice. Top each with an equal amount of avocado cubes, sweet potato, shredded kale, and leftover roasted veggies, if available.
For the vinaigrette, combine all of the ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth.
Top each serving bowl with 2 tablespoons of the Carrot-Ginger Vinaigrette and mix with a fork, serve at room temperature, or heat as desired.
ingredients: 6 cups cooked brown rice (about 3 cups uncooked)
1 cup roasted sweet potatoes, cut into 1-inch cubes
1 ripe avocado, pitted, peeled, and cubed
2 tablespoons peeled and roughly chopped fresh ginger
